document.docAuthor: Rosa, Paolo, Aswathi, Pokkattu Gopi & Bijoy, Chenthamarakshan
document.masterDocTitle: An annotated and illustrated checklist of the Indian cuckoo wasps (Hymenoptera: Chrysididae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: An annotated and illustrated checklist of the Indian cuckoo wasps (Hymenoptera: Chrysididae)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Chrysis splendida Fabricius, 1775
: Donovan 1800 –1804: 115 (descr. Tamil Nadu : Tranquebar [= Tharangambadi ]).

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Stilbum splendidum : du Buysson 1896b: 478
( West Bengal : Calcutta [= Kolkata]; Maharashtra : Poona [= Pune]; Gujarat : Surat , S Guzerat [= S Gujarat ]; Chhattisgarh : Raipur; Tamil Nadu : Pondichery ; Karnataka : Mysore), pl. III (figs 11, 12), pl. V (fig. 8).

Stilbum splendidum
var. Lereillei (sic)
du Buysson, 1896a: 678
. Syntypes , India : Maharashtra : Bombay [= Mumbai ] (MNHN). Emendated into leveillei by
Kimsey & Bohart 1991: 567
.

Stilbum cyanurum splendidum Spinola
:
Jonathan et al. 1977: 87
( India ).

Stilbum
sp. ( superbum ):
Thakkar & Parikh 2018: 23
(cat., Gujarat ).

caption.paragraph:
FIGURE 78.
Stilbum cyanurum ( Forster, 1771 )
, female. A. Habitus, dorsal view. B. Habitus, lateral view. Scale bars 1.0 mm.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Trichrysis Lichtenstein, 1876: 27
(as subgenus of
Chrysis Linnaeus, 1761
).

Type species:
Sphex cyanea Linnaeus, 1758: 572
[=
Trichrysis cyanea ( Linnaeus, 1758 )
]. Monotypic.
